payload.border_comment:
**Stable:**
Waiting for approves for release with internal id ((/services/1/edit/1/jobs?jobId=1&isClownJob=true release:1)).

**Managers should approve** by setting status "ready for release" to this ticket.
**After this, developers should write:**
%%
OK for release:1
%%
in the comments to this ticket.

See the instruction for the deploy ((https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/taxi/backend/basichowto/deploy/ here)).
payload.finished_deploy_msg:
Deployment of the release with internal id release:1 is finished.

Ensure the service works properly in stable, then leave a message
%%
CLOSE TICKET for release:1
%%
to close this ticket.

If the assignee is unable to leave this message,
managers or developers are also able to do that:
кто:some-developer1, кто:some-manager1
payload.managers_ok_received_msg:
**Stable:**
Managers approved release with internal id release:1.
Waiting for developers approve.
**Developers should write:**
%%
OK for release:1
%%
in the comments to this ticket.

See the instruction for the deploy ((https://wiki.yandex-team.ru/taxi/backend/basichowto/deploy/ here)).
